title: Cloud Technical Solutions Engineer, Infrastructure, Google Kubernetes Engine
location: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India; Pune, Maharashtra, India
description: The Google Cloud team helps companies, schools, and government seamlessly make the switch to Google products and supports them along the way. Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in the field of Science, Technology, Engineering, Math or equivalent practical experience. Experience with Linux/Unix or Windows systems, from the kernel to the shell, file systems, and client-server protocols. Experience reading/debugging code and in virtualization and orchestration frameworks. Ability to communicate in English fluently.
preferred_qualifications: Experience debugging complex workload issues across large-scale, multi-node environments. Experience with exploratory kernel debugging and performance analysis of containerized systems. Experience in Computer Networking. Experience working with any public cloud services and infrastructure. Understanding of basic web technologies.
responsibilities: Work with customers on their production Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE)/Cloud Services Management deployments to resolve issues and achieve product readiness, availability, and scale. Develop an in-depth understanding of Google Cloud's GKE/Cloud Services Management technology. Act as consultant and subject matter expert for internal stakeholders. Work as part of a team of engineers to ensure 24-hour customer support. Understand customer issues and advocate for their needs.
